headline: Powell Under Pressure
summary: Mixed U.S. stock market update: resilient data, Powell DOJ probe, cooling inflation, and a housing rebound lift REITs. Read what investors need to know.

headline: Top Picks 2026- Alexandria Real Estate Equities Inc. ARE
summary: Investors rarely get a chance to buy a dominant franchise at a price that assumes the business is headed for long-term trouble. That is exactly the situation with Alexandria Real Estate Equities Inc. (ARE) moving into 2026, writes Tim Melvin, editor of The Flagship Report.
